Name: Bhop Craze
About the game: BhopCraze is THE bunnyhopping game. Play alone or compete against friends and other players on dedicated servers on pre-built maps or on maps created by the BhopCraze community found in the Steam Workshop. Save replays of your best runs and share them with friends. As mentioned above, BhopCraze has full integration with the Steam workshop. You can create maps in a convenient in-game editor and download maps created by other BhopCraze players!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Bhop Craze? Check out the release date (Aug 29, 2022), developer insights from Bialy, and a complete game summary.
